name: Ameline and The Ultimate Burger - demo
name_original: Ameline and The Ultimate Burger - demo
description:
The king was cursed, and won't eat anything! Bring him the Ultimate Burger and revive his appetite, but beware, the power of the Ultimate Burger will make the whole kingdom drool, defend it with your needles!

Ameline and the Ultimate Burger, although a cute and pleasant game, will put you and your friend's dexterity to the test!

While being a family game for everyone, it will take precision, focus, and fast reactions to defend the Ultimate Burger.

THIS GAME SHOULD BE PLAYED WITH A GAMEPAD!

No one is forcing you to, but it does change everything.

Playing with friends or family is highly recommended! It does change everything too.

It's one of those games you'd play on a couch and have a good time with people you like!
